Package model

Class Assignment

java.lang.Object
model.Assignment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Assignment>
public class Assignment extends Object implements Comparable<Assignment>
The Assignment class represents an assignment with a course name, task description, and due date. It implements the Comparable interface to allow comparisons based on due dates.

  • Constructor Details

    • Assignment

      public Assignment()
      Constructs an Assignment object by taking input from the user for course name, task, and due date. The due date input is validated to ensure it is in the format "YYYY-MM-DD".

    • Assignment

      public Assignment(String course, String task, Date date)
      Constructs an Assignment object with the provided course name, task, and due date.
      Parameters:
      course - The course name.
      task - The task description.
      date - The due date.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Assignment o)
      Compares this assignment to another based on their due dates.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Assignment>
      Parameters:
      o - The assignment to compare to.
      Returns:
      A negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this assignment is before, equal to, or after the specified assignment.
